markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Timeless Body](/Feats.aspx?ID=476) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 164 <sup>4.0</sup>

</column>

---

You cease aging. In addition, you gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against poisons and diseases, and you gain resistance to poison damage equal to half your level.
name: Timeless Body
